hero.title: House of Pahlavi
hero.name: Parsis Foundation
hero.tagline: Connecting Persians to Technology, Media & Opportunity
hero.description: A family foundation dedicated to empowering the global Persian diaspora through access to free media, AI tools, secure communications, and educational technology.

home.intro: Parsis Foundation is a family foundation of the House of Pahlavi, working to ensure Persians worldwide have access to uncensored information, modern technology, AI tools, and secure communications.
home.quote: Access to information is the foundation of freedom. We build bridges where others build walls.
home.legacyText1: Millions of Persians face barriers to accessing free media, modern technology, and AI tools. We work to remove these barriers through education, infrastructure, and direct support.
home.legacyText2: From secure messaging to AI literacy, from VPN access to digital skills training—we provide the tools Persians need to connect, learn, and thrive in the modern world.
home.legacyQuote: When information flows freely, people can make informed decisions about their lives, their communities, and their future.
home.valuesDescription: We believe every Persian deserves access to the same information, tools, and opportunities available to the rest of the world. Technology is the great equalizer.
home.communityDesc: Breaking through censorship to deliver free, uncensored information
home.generosityDesc: Bringing cutting-edge AI tools and digital literacy to Persian communities
home.inclusivityDesc: Protecting privacy and enabling safe communication for all

biography.title: About
biography.headline: About Parsis Foundation
biography.subtitle: A family foundation of the House of Pahlavi dedicated to ensuring the global Persian community has access to free media, modern technology, AI tools, and secure communications.
biography.earlyLifeText: Parsis Foundation works to bridge the digital divide facing Persians worldwide. We provide access to uncensored media, AI and technology tools, digital literacy training, secure communication platforms, and educational resources.
biography.educationText: We take a practical, technology-first approach. We build and fund infrastructure that helps Persians access information freely, communicate securely, and leverage modern AI tools for education and opportunity.
biography.residenceText: Based in Switzerland with global operations, we serve Persian communities in Iran, the diaspora across North America, Europe, Australia, and wherever Persians need support accessing technology and information.
biography.artisticPracticeText1: The Pahlavi family believes that access to information and technology is a fundamental right. Through Parsis Foundation, we channel resources toward ensuring every Persian can access the digital tools and information they need.
biography.artisticPracticeText2: We work with technology partners, media organizations, and local communities to maximize impact and ensure our programs reach those who need them most.
biography.exhibitionsSubtitle: Direct support for Persian communities worldwide
biography.humanitarianText1: Our programs reach Persians inside Iran and across the global diaspora—providing VPN access, AI tools, digital literacy training, and secure communication platforms.
biography.humanitarianText2: We partner with technology companies, media organizations, and human rights groups to deliver programs effectively and at scale.
biography.civicTechSubtitle: Partner with us to expand technology access for Persians
biography.professionalText1: Parsis Foundation is led by the Pahlavi family with expertise in technology, privacy, cryptography, and media infrastructure.
biography.professionalText2: Our team combines deep technical knowledge with understanding of the unique challenges facing the Persian community.

mission.title: What We Do
mission.headline: Connecting Persians to the Digital World
mission.subtitle: Our programs focus on breaking down barriers to technology, media, and information—empowering Persians worldwide to access the tools and knowledge they need.

sustainability.title: Free Media Access
sustainability.description: We fund and build infrastructure to help Persians access uncensored news, independent journalism, and diverse perspectives. When information flows freely, people can make informed decisions.
sustainability.quote: Censorship thrives in darkness. We bring light through technology and perseverance.

coexistence.title: AI & Technology Tools
coexistence.description: We provide free access to AI assistants, translation tools, educational technology, and productivity software. Every Persian deserves access to the same tools available to the rest of the world.
coexistence.quote: AI is transforming how people learn, work, and create. Persians should not be left behind.

education.title: Digital Literacy
education.description: Training programs teaching digital skills, online safety, AI literacy, and technology fundamentals. From basic computer skills to advanced AI prompting—we meet people where they are.
education.quote: Technology is only powerful when people know how to use it safely and effectively.

cooperation.title: Secure Communications
cooperation.description: Encrypted messaging platforms, VPN access, and privacy tools that protect users from surveillance. Safe communication is essential for journalists, activists, and ordinary citizens alike.
cooperation.quote: Privacy is not about having something to hide. It's about having the freedom to think and speak.

prosperity.title: Educational Resources
prosperity.description: Online courses, scholarships, and educational content in Farsi. We translate and create resources that help Persians access global knowledge and opportunity.
prosperity.quote: Education opens doors. We ensure those doors are not locked by language or geography.

identity.title: Technology Infrastructure
identity.description: Building and funding the technical infrastructure—servers, networks, tools—that makes all our other programs possible. Sustainable technology access requires sustainable infrastructure.
identity.quote: We don't just provide fish. We build fishing rods and teach people to fish.
